content: *k3tbl p1 p2tog repeat from * around row 8 *k3tbl p2 repeat from * around row 9 *k3tbl p2 repeat from * around row 10 *k3tbl p2tog repeat from * around row 11 *k3tbl p1 repeat from * around row 12 *k1tbl ssk p1 repeat from * around row 13 *k2tbl p1 repeat from * around row 14 *ssk p1 repeat from * around row 15 *k1tbl p repeat from * around row 16 ssk around row 17 ssk around cut yarn leaving about 10 inches and thread through a yarn needle weave through the remaining stitches on the dpns twice and cinch it weave in ends
